front.title: Enabling secure network enrollment in RPL networks

abstract.t: [I-D.richardson-6tisch-join-enhanced-beacon] defines a method by which a potential [I-D.ietf-6tisch-minimal-security] can announce itself as a available for new Pledges to Join a network. The announcement includes a priority for join. This document provides a mechanism by which a RPL DODAG root can disable join announcements, or adjust the base priority for join operation.
